select course.course_id as courseId, course.img_url as url,course.name as `name`, classify.img as classifyUrl, classify.course_classify_name as classifyName, course.point as point, course.price as price, course.age_onset as startAge, course.age_end as endAge, IF(course.teacher_name is null ,address.business_address_name,course.teacher_name) as addressOrTeacherName, course.number as maxPeople , IF(reserve.reserve_num is null ,course.number,reserve.reserve_num) as residuePeople, IF(collect.collect_id is null,'false','true') as isCollect, round(st_distance_sphere (point (#{conditionVo.lon},#{conditionVo.lat}),point (address.lon,address.lat))/1000,1) as addressNum, detail.course_detail_id as courseDetailId from life_course as course left join life_collect as collect on collect.collect_course_id = course.course_id and collect.user_id = #{userId} LEFT join life_business_address as address on address.business_address_id = course.business_address_id inner join life_course_classify as classify on classify.course_classify_id = course.course_classify_id inner join life_course_detail as detail on detail.course_id = course.course_id left join life_reserve as reserve on reserve.course_detail_id = detail.course_detail_id and reserve.reserve_date = #{conditionVo.date}
detail.course_detail_id = ( select course_detail_id from life_course_detail where course_id = course.course_id and ( start_hour > date_format(#{conditionVo.date},'%H') or start_minute > date_format(#{conditionVo.date},'%i') and start_hour = date_format(#{conditionVo.date},'%H') ) and week = date_format(#{conditionVo.date},'%w') order by start_hour asc,start_minute asc limit 1 ) and
(course.age_onset between #{conditionVo.startAge} and #{conditionVo.endAge} or course.age_end between #{conditionVo.startAge} and #{conditionVo.endAge} or course.age_end = -1) and
course.course_type = #{conditionVo.courseType} and
course.course_classify_id in (select course_classify_id from life_course_classify where pid = #{conditionVo.courseClassifyId}) and
course.course_label_id = #{conditionVo.courseLabelId} and
course.course_kind = #{conditionVo.courseKind} and course.status = 1 and course.delete_flage = 0
order by course.recommend desc
